rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Vastu-aligned entrance, inviting open space.
Modern living room with large windows and integrated entertainment area, ensuring natural light per Vastu principles.
Functional kitchen designed according to Indian norms, well-connected to dining space.
Open dining area adjoining the kitchen, promoting social interaction.
Well-ventilated bathroom with proper drainage and Vastu compliant layout.
Dedicated private gym space equipped with modern fitness equipment, soundproofing for privacy.
Main duplex unit designed as a 1-bedroom hall living arrangement with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Vastu considerations ensure positive energy flow.

openings.description: Primary entrance door aligning with Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
Large windows in living room offering abundant natural light and ventilation.
Functional windows to facilitate air circulation in the kitchen.
Soundproof door ensuring privacy and noise isolation for the gym area.
